query:
UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Capricorn Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Ambition, Discipline, And Enduring Success - The Sacred Guardian of Capricorn',
  description = 'In the celestial wisdom of Western astrology, Capricorn (December 22 - January 19) embodies ambition, discipline, and enduring success. This sacred pendant has been consecrated by senior monks at Wutai Mountain, one of China''s Four Great Buddhist Mountains and a UNESCO World Cultural Heritage site.

**Spiritual Significance:**
Capricorn individuals are blessed with unique cosmic energies that shape their destiny and character. This pendant serves as a spiritual anchor, connecting you to the celestial forces that guide your path.

**Consecration Ritual:**
Each pendant is blessed by enlightened masters at Wutai Mountain through sacred consecration ceremonies. These senior monks, having devoted decades to spiritual cultivation, channel divine energy and protective blessings into each piece. Through continuous sutra recitation and ritual offerings, the masters infuse every pendant with spiritual power that shields the wearer from negative influences and attracts auspicious fortune.

**Design & Craftsmanship:**
Crafted from premium silver with a luminous crescent moon design, this pendant features intricate constellation engravings that glow softly in the dark—a reminder of the celestial protection that watches over you.

**Who Should Wear This:**
- Those born under Capricorn (December 22 - January 19)
- Individuals seeking to enhance their natural Capricorn qualities
- Anyone facing life transitions or seeking spiritual guidance
- Those who wish to align with cosmic energies for prosperity

May this sacred talisman connect you to the wisdom of the stars and guide you through life''s journey with divine protection.'
WHERE id = 510022;

UPDATE products SET 
  name = 'Wutai Mountain Blessed Aquarius Guardian Pendant',
  shortDescription = 'Innovation, Humanitarian Vision, And Independent Thinking - The Sacred Guardian of Aquarius',
  description = 'In the celestial wisdom of Western astrology, Aquarius (January 20 - February 18) embodies innovation, humanitarian vision, and independent thinking. WHERE id = 510023;
